name: Resquack
description:
Oh no! The little Ducks are missing, you must save them and bring them back to the Safe lake

Keep them safe from the danger of the road.

Do not let the weather scare you.

Your mission is to take the ducklings from one side of the street to the other and go with them to the lagoon with their mother. How many ducks can you save?

You can carry the ducks that you consider necessary at the same time, but remember that these can be in danger and are very far from you.

Along the way you will encounter various dangers and obstacles such as a dog, trucks, cars, motorcycles, traffic cones and even an alien!
